metadata.title: Favicon Generator - Create Favicons in All Sizes | tool-chest
metadata.description: Free online favicon generator. Create favicons in all standard sizes (16x16, 32x32, 192x192, 512x512) from any image. Generate complete favicon packages with manifest files.

info.title: About Favicon Generation
info.description: A favicon is a small icon that represents your website in browser tabs, bookmarks, and shortcuts. Modern web applications require multiple favicon sizes and formats to support different devices and platforms.

bestPractices.title: Best Practices
items: Start with high resolution (512x512 or larger)
Simple designs work better at small sizes
Include multiple sizes for device compatibility
